channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In The Race To Power Data Centers, Which Fuel Will Win Is The Wrong Question
item.description: The idea that one fuel will “win” is the wrong way of looking at it.

item.title: The New Era Of Work: Human-AI Collaboration Is Redefining The Modern Workplace
item.description: It’s not about machines working instead of humans—it’s about machines working hand-in-hand with employees to create better outcomes together.

item.title: S&S Activewear Is On The Cutting Edge Of Warehouse Automation
item.description: Flexible warehouse automation is revolutionizing distribution. S&S Activewear has the largest implementation of a new wave of warehouse automation.

item.title: Do Not Click These Notifications On Your Phone
item.description: New warning for Android users — what to know.

item.title: From Savior To Scapegoat: How IT Can Regain Its Business Hero Status
item.description: IT once wore the hero's cape—now it takes the blame for everything. But with proactive IT, the glory days can return and redefine what IT means to bus...

item.title: What do you need more of?
item.description: If our day (and our work) would get better if we had more: …we know where to get it. If not, then why are we spending our magical attention there?

item.title: Status (and the grass tax)
item.description: Status shows up whenever humans do, and it is the invisible underpinning of our culture. The front lawn was only invented around the time of Columbus....

item.title: Ecosystems come and go
item.description: Your project doesn’t exist in a vacuum. Your company wouldn’t exist if it weren’t for the customers, competitors, marketplaces, systems and tech that ...

item.title: Grab and go
item.description: Every retailer knows that the items that sell the best are at eye level or at the cash register. Some people are hungry, rushed, distracted and lazy. ...

item.title: Ready to be…
item.description: Disappointed Delighted Amazed Offended Ripped off Grateful Loved Sometimes we get what we expect.
